chunks: You should avoid injecting insulin through clothes or into lumps or bruising areas. But you should rotate injection sites and use a new needle for each injection.

70.answer: You should avoid injecting insulin through clothes or into lumps or bruising areas. But you should rotate injection sites and use a new needle for each injection.

chunks: You should rotate injection sites to prevent lumps from occurring. Correct rotation involves spacing insulin injections at least 1cm apart in the same injection zone.
71.complete_chunks: Why is it important to rotate insulin injection sites?;You should rotate injection sites to prevent lumps from occurring. Correct rotation involves spacing insulin injections at least 1cm apart in the same injection zone.
71.question: Why is it important to rotate insulin injection sites?
71.answer: You should rotate injection sites to prevent lumps from occurring. Correct rotation involves spacing insulin injections at least 1cm apart in the same injection zone.

chunks: Injecting through clothes may cause an infection at the site and the insulin may not get delivered into the subcutaneous layer and therefore may not work.

72.answer: Injecting through clothes may cause an infection at the site and the insulin may not get delivered into the subcutaneous layer and therefore may not work.
